localize.title: Buzzing on Reddit
localize.description: See what's buzzing on Reddit in your native language

blogPost.excerpt: Flinkit! provides remote teams with fun and creative cooperation opportunities to enhance teamwork and trust. Teams can compete at the same time as they follow the carefully designed storyline solving highly visual tasks and riddles.
blogPost.body: Flinkit! provides remote teams with fun and creative cooperation opportunities to enhance teamwork and trust. Teams can compete at the same time as they follow the carefully designed storyline solving highly visual tasks and riddles.
blogPost.title: Online teambuilding by Flinkit! - Web-hosted team building games for small and large companies
blogPost.author: David Sipos

localize.description: Flinkit！为远程团队提供趣味性和创造性的合作机会，增强团队合作和信任。团队可以在竞争的同时，按照精心设计的故事情节解决高度可视化的任务和谜语。
localize.tagline: 适用于小型和大型公司的网络托管团队建设游戏。

localize.description: Flinkit！爲遠程團隊提供趣味性和創造性的合作機會，增強團隊合作和信任。團隊可以在競爭的同時，按照精心設計的故事情節解決高度可視化的任務和謎語。
localize.tagline: 適用於小型和大型公司的網絡託管團隊建設遊戲。

previous.excerpt: Over 2.2 million+ curated SVGs, Vector Icons, Illustrations, 3D graphics, and Lottie Animations. Over 3000+ assets added every day. Integrated plugins, tools, editors, and more.
previous.title: Iconscout Desktop App - Curated SVGs, Vector Icons, Illustrations & 3D graphics

localize.description: 超过220万+策划的SVGs、矢量图标、插图、3D图形和Lottie动画。每天添加超过3000+资产。集成插件、工具、编辑器等。
localize.tagline: 策划的SVG、矢量图标、插图和3D图形。

localize.description: 超過220萬+策劃的SVGs、矢量圖標、插圖、3D圖形和Lottie動畫。每天添加超過3000+資產。集成插件、工具、編輯器等。
localize.tagline: 策劃的SVG、矢量圖標、插圖和3D圖形。

next.excerpt: Stop interrupting with @channel! Usually anyone can answer so why do we keep distracting everyone? Tellspin makes it easy to create schedules / escalation policies for Slack. Share the load with your team members with built-in user groups/@mentions.
next.title: Tellspin - Automatic user group / @mention rotation in Slack

localize.description: 别再用@channel打岔了! 通常任何人都可以回答，为什么我们要一直分散大家的注意力？Tellspin让你轻松为Slack创建日程/升级策略。通过内置的用户组/@mentions与你的团队成员分担负荷。
localize.tagline: 在Slack中自动轮流使用用户组/@mention

localize.description: 別再用@channel打岔了! 通常任何人都可以回答，爲什麼我們要一直分散大家的注意力？Tellspin讓你輕鬆爲Slack創建日程/升級策略。通過內置的用戶組/@mentions與你的團隊成員分擔負荷。
localize.tagline: 在Slack中自動輪流使用用戶組/@mention
